DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the effects of the cholesterol medication taken with each blood pressure medication alone on heart disease risk factors including blood pressure, cholesterol, inflammation, blood sugar control, blood vessal function, and other heart disease risk factors.
DOC.brief_title: The Pleiotropic Effects of Atorvastatin When Combined With Common Antihypertenisve Medications.
DOC.criteria: mild hypertension and high cholesterol diabetes and heart disease
